name: Canyon Races
description: It's unusual car racing game. Tuned by best mechanics of our planet cars will take a part in rivalry against UFO. Aliens will fight in specially prepared canyon. The inhabitants of our planet for a long time were trying to establish contact with other civilizations. Finally, their efforts were crowned with success. The expedition of scientists has discovered an UFO base in the foothills of the Andes on the border with the Amazon forest. After the first emotions eruption scientists decided to negotiate and discuss relations with aliens. Earthlings have been disappointed with the results: attempts to obtain high technologies were failed. Only through cunning and ability to find unconventional moves during the negotiations, we've reached a compromise. Now our riders are challenged. To become owners of the amazing technologies we have to beat the best alien aces. Sport funs will find in the game something like ski half-pipe, slalom and freestyle. Pilot can select different tracks, cars, and train with less rapid UFO before the fight with alien aces. You can control your car very simply. Just use arrow keys, SHIFT and SPACE to accelerate, slow down, rotate, change direction.
